mantra paṭalaḥ dvitīya

original: | vajrā gaurītyādi ayaṃ mantrayogaḥ | āṃ-kāra' niṣpannāṃ śuklāṃ śavārūḍhāṃ kartrikapālakhaṭvāṅgadharāṃ vajrāṃ vibhāvya oṃ hūṃ svāheti pūrvasevārthaṃ lakṣaṃ japet |
analyzed: vajrā gaurī ityādi ayam mantra yogaḥ āṃ kāra niṣpannām śuklām śava ārūḍhām kartri kapāla khaṭvāṅga dharām vajrām vibhāvya om svāhā iti pūrva sevā artham lakṣam japet

original: paścādapakvaśarāve maṃ-kāraṃ khaṭikayā'bhilikhya tanmadhye oṃ hūṃ devadattaṃ stambhaya hūṃ svāheti abhilikhya śmaśānabhasmanā pūrayitvā aparāpakvaśarāvena sampuṭīkṛtya tadupari māhendramaṇḍalaṃ yugalaṃ digvajairupaśobhitaṃ vilikhya bhūmitale saṃsthāpya pādenākramya pūrvavat samādhistho mantraṃ japet, oṃ hūṃ vajre devadattaṃ stambhaya hū~ svāheti aṣṭottaraśataṃ sahasraṃ vā japet |
analyzed: paścāt apakva śarāve maṃ kāram khaṭikayā abhilikhya tad madhye om devadattam stambhaya svāhā iti abhilikhya śmaśāna bhasmanā pūrayitvā apara apakva śarāvena sampuṭīkṛtya tad upari māhendra
stambhitaḥ bhavati

original: evaṃ iṃ-kārākṣaraniṣpannāṃ kuṃku māruṇāṃ gaurīṃ vibhāvya pāśāṅkuśadharām, aṃ - kāraṃ bandhūkakusumāruṇaṃ svahṛdi dhyātvā, oṃ aṃ- svāhā iti pūrvasevārthaṃ lakṣaṃ japet, sādhyāṃ raktavarṇāṃ nagnāṃ muktakeśīmagrato dhyātvā, tasyā bhage aṃ- kāram 'gnivarṇaṃ dhyātvā, athavā puruṣasya hṛdaye, aṃ- kāravahninā pratāpyamānaṃ vihvalaṃ dhyātvā, oṃ aṃ gaurī amukīṃ me vaśamānaya aṃ svāhā, pāśena galake baddhvā aṅkuśena hṛdi viddhvā samākṛṣya pādatale nipatitāṃ dhyātvā japaṃ kuryāt, niyataṃ vaśyā bhavati |
analyzed: evam iṃ kāra akṣara niṣpannām kuṃku māruṇām gaurīm vibhāvya pāśa aṅkuśa dharām aṃ kāram bandhūka kusuma aruṇam sva hṛdi dhyātvā om aṃ svāhā iti pūrva sevā artham lakṣam japet

original: tathaiva iṃ-kāraniṣpannāṃ vāriyoginīṃ nīlavarṇāṃ mudgara tarjanīhastāṃ dhyātvā hṛtsūrye nīla - khaṃ- kāraṃ dṛṣṭvā pūrvasevārthaṃ oṃ khaṃ svāheti lakṣaṃ japet dvitīya: ] vajrapañjikā yogaratnamālā sādhyaṃ nagnaṃ muktakeśaṃ nīlavarṇaṃ daṃṣṭrārūḍhaṃ dhyātvā dakṣiṇābhimukhaṃ krūrairlaguḍa- hastairnirhanyamānaṃ palāyamānaṃ dhyātvā mantraṃ āvartayayet - oṃ khaṃ vāriyogini, amukam uccāṭaya khaṃ hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ saptarātreṇa niyatam uccāṭayati |
analyzed: tathā eva iṃ kāra niṣpannām vāri yoginīm nīla varṇām mudgara tarjanī hastām dhyātvā hṛd sūrye nīla khaṃ kāram dṛṣṭvā pūrva sevā artham om khaṃ svāhā iti lakṣam japet dvitīya

original: tathaiva vajraḍākinīyogam' u-kāreṇa dhyātvā hatsūrye jrīṃ- kāraṃ nīlavarṇaṃ dhyātvā oṃ jrīṃ svāhā iti lakṣaṃ japeta' |
analyzed: tathā eva vajra ḍākinī yogam u kāreṇa dhyātvā hat sūrye jrīṃ kāram nīla varṇam dhyātvā om jrīṃ svāhā iti lakṣam japeta

original: pūrvasevārthaṃ sādhyau aśvamahiṣārūḍhau dhyātvā'nyonyaṃ yudhyamānau japaṃ kuryāt tathaiva, oṃ jrīṃ vajraḍākinī devadatta' - yajñadattayorvidveṣaṃ kuru jrīṃ hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ niyataṃ vidveṣayati |
analyzed: pūrva sevā artham sādhyau aśva mahiṣa ārūḍhau dhyātvā nyonyam yudhyamānau japam kuryāt tathā eva om jrīṃ vajra ḍākinī devadatta yajñadattayoḥ vidveṣam kuru jrīṃ hūm phaṭ niyatam

original: tathaiva aṃ-kāraniṣpannāṃ nairātmyāṃ vikṛtarūpāṃ kapālakhaṭvāṅga kartridharāṃ vicintya hatsūrye nīlavarṇaṃ' buṃ-kāraṃ dṛṣṭvā pūrvasevāṃ kṛtvā brahmakapāle viṣarāji- kālavaṇarudhireṇa ṣaṭkoṇaṃ cakraṃ abhilikhya koṇeṣu hūṃ-kāraṃ vilikhya madhye oṃ buṃ amukaṃ jvaraya hūṃ, anyatamopadraveṣu nāma vidarbhya tuṣāgnau tau tāpayet |
analyzed: tathā eva aṃ kāra niṣpannām nairātmyām vikṛta rūpām kapāla khaṭvāṅga kartri dharām vicintya hat sūrye nīla varṇam buṃ kāram dṛṣṭvā pūrva sevām kṛtvā brahmakapāle viṣa rāji kāla

original: sarvaṃ kuryāt krūrakarmaṇi mantraśeṣe sarvatra hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ kuryāt |
analyzed: sarvam kuryāt krūra karmaṇi mantra śeṣe sarvatra hūm hūm hūm phaṭ kuryāt

original: tathaiva svabījena pariniṣpannāṃ śavārūḍhāṃ khecarīṃ vibhāvya pūrvasevāṃ kṛtvā vāyvagnimaṇḍalopari sādhyāṃ vihvalāṃ dhyātvā hṛdbījād raktavarṇaraśmijvālāṃ niścārya sādhyāyā dakṣiṇanāsāpuṭena praveśya hṛdayaṃ viddhvā vāmanāsāpuṭena niṣkāśya hadbīje ānīya śvāsavāyunā ākarṣayan mantraṃ japet, niyatamākarṣayati |
analyzed: tathā eva sva bījena pariniṣpannām śava ārūḍhām khecarīm vibhāvya pūrva sevām kṛtvā vāyu agni maṇḍala upari sādhyām vihvalām dhyātvā hṛd bījāt rakta varṇa raśmi jvālām niścārya sādhyāyāḥ

original: tathaiva svabījaniryātabhūcarīyogaṃ nīlanibhaṃ dhyātvā pūrvasevāṃ kṛtvā ghuḥ kārākṣaraniṣpannaṃ jvalad vajraṃ sādhyasyādhomukhaṃ kaṭideśe nikhanyamānaṃ dhyātvā mantraṃ japet |
analyzed: tathā eva sva bīja niryāta bhūcarī yogam nīla nibham dhyātvā pūrva sevām kṛtvā ghuḥ kārā akṣara niṣpannam jvalat vajram sādhyasya adhomukham kaṭi deśe nikhanyamānam dhyātvā mantram japet

original: oṃ ghuḥ bhūcarī amukaṃ māraya ghuḥ hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ niyataṃ mārayati |
analyzed: om ghuḥ bhūcarī amukam māraya ghuḥ hūm phaṭ niyatam mārayati

original: || iti yogaratnamālāyāṃ kṛṣṇācāryapādakṛtau hevajrapañjikāyāṃ mantrapaṭalo dvitīyaḥ ||
analyzed: iti yogaratnamālāyām kṛṣṇa ācārya pāda kṛtau hevajrapañjikāyām mantra paṭalaḥ dvitīyaḥ

original: devatāpaṭalaḥ tṛtīyaḥ devatā' paṭalaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ - prathamaṃ bhāvayenmaitrīṃ dvitīye karuṇāṃ tathā | tṛtīye bhāvayen modaṃ upekṣāṃ sarvaśeṣataḥ || 1||
analyzed: devatā paṭalaḥ tṛtīyaḥ devatā paṭalam vyākhyāsyāmaḥ prathamam bhāvayet maitrīm dvitīye karuṇām tathā tṛtīye bhāvayet modam upekṣām sarvaśeṣataḥ

original: tasmāt punarapi prathamaṃ śūnyatābodhiṃ dvitīyaṃ bījasaṃgraham tṛtīyaṃ bimbaniṣpattiṃ caturthaṃ nyāsamakṣaram ||2||
analyzed: tasmāt punar api prathamam śūnyatā bodhim dvitīyam bīja saṃgraham tṛtīyam bimba niṣpattim caturtham nyāsam akṣaram

original: devatāpaṭalamiti, devatānāṃ hevajrāṇāṃ vajrayoginīnāṃ paṭalaṃ hevajrādīnā- mutpattiyogān yathoktavitaṇān, ihaiva viśeṣeṇākhyāsyāmaḥ |
analyzed: devatā paṭalam iti devatānām hevajrāṇām vajra yoginīnām paṭalam hevajra ādīnām utpatti yogān yathā ukta vitaṇān iha eva viśeṣeṇa ākhyāsyāmaḥ
prathamam ityādi
karuṇā ādi apekṣayā prathamam iti ucyate

original: sarvaprathamaṃ tu manorame sthāne sthitvā sukhāsane niṣadya sthānātmayogarakṣārthaṃ oṃ rakṣa rakṣa hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāheti triruccārya paṭādigatamūrti bhagavantam, abhyarcya svamantreṇārdhaṃ parijapya pāpadeśanāṃ puṇyānumodanāṃ triśaraṇagamanaṃ kṛtvā bodhicittamupasthāpya tataḥ prathamaṃ bhāvayed maitrīṃ sarvasattveṣu niruttarasukhopanayanākārām, dvitīye kṣaṇe teṣveva sarva- duḥkhāpanayanākārāṃ karuṇām, tṛtīye teṣveva divyasukhāvicchedaniyamākārāṃ muditām, upekṣāṃ sarvaśeṣataḥ teṣveva sakalakleśopakleśapratipakṣamārgopasaṃhārākārāṃ bhāvaye- diti vartate || 1 ||
analyzed: sarva prathamam tu manorame sthāne sthitvā sukha āsane niṣadya sthāna ātma yoga rakṣā artham om rakṣa rakṣa hūm hūm hūm phaṭ svāhā iti tris uccārya paṭa ādi gata mūrti bhagavantam abhyarcya sakala kleśa upakleśa pratipakṣa mārga upasaṃhāra ākārām bhāvaye iti vartate
ayam ādyasya yogasya parikaraḥ sakala yoga sādhāraṇa māyā upamasya śarīram āha
tasmāt punar api iti
paścāt bhāvayet iti vartate

ratnasaṃbhavaḥ mahā ratnam khaḍgam karma kulasya ca

original: yo hi yogī bhavet kṛṣṇo akṣobhyastasya devatā |
analyzed: yaḥ hi yogī bhavet kṛṣṇaḥ akṣobhyaḥ tasya devatā
yaḥ hi yogī mahā gauḥ kuladevatā

original: yo hi yogī mahāśyāmo devatā yo hi yogī mahāpiṅgo ratneśaḥ kuladevatā || 6 ||
analyzed: yaḥ hi yogī mahāśyāmaḥ devatā yaḥ hi yogī mahāpiṅgaḥ ratneśaḥ kuladevatā
gāḍhena ityādi
iti āha iti vakṣyamāṇakam
akṣobhya kulam iti akṣobhyasya tat kulam iti

original: raktagauro hira yo yogī amitābhaḥ kuladevatā |
analyzed: rakta gauraḥ yaḥ yogī amita ābhaḥ kuladevatā

original: śvetagauro hi yo yogī tasya vajra sattvakulaṃ bhavet ||7||
analyzed: śveta gauraḥ hi yaḥ yogī tasya vajra sattva kulam bhavet
jantavaḥ na abhimantavyāḥ na viheṭhyāḥ yoga pāragaiḥ
tathāgatānām kulāḥ te syuḥ rūpam āśritya sāṃvṛtam

original: strīṇāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ caiva yathā puṃsi tathaiva ca tāsāmapi kulāste syuḥ saṃvṛtyācārarūpataḥ ||9||
analyzed: strīṇām lakṣaṇam ca eva yathā puṃsi tathā eva ca tāsām api kulāḥ te syuḥ saṃvṛtya ācāra rūpataḥ

original: tatra tuṣṭo mahāvajrī bhagaliṅgasya bhagaliṅgasya cumbanāt |
analyzed: tatra tuṣṭaḥ mahā vajrī bhaga liṅgasya bhaga liṅgasya cumbanāt
nairātmyām bodhayāmāsa śṛṇu devi prapūjanam

original: udyāne vijanedeśe ātmāgārāntareṣu ca nagnīkṛtya mahāmudrāṃ pūjayed yogavit sadā cumbanāliṅganaṃ kṛtvā bhagasparśaṃ tathaiva ca || 11 ||
analyzed: udyāne vijane deśe ātma āgāra antareṣu ca nagnīkṛtya mahāmudrām pūjayet yoga vid sadā cumbana āliṅganam kṛtvā bhaga sparśam tathā eva ca
vṛṣaṇam nara nāsāyāḥ pānam adhara madhusya
sattva kulam iti vajra sattva kulam
tāsām iti strīṇām te iti tathāgatāḥ
bodhayāmāsa iti āmantritavān

original: vajratantre madanāṅgakaraiḥ karma bolavān kurute sadā |
analyzed: vajratantre madana aṅga karaiḥ karma bolavān kurute sadā
daulāṅga kūrpareṇa api sahajārthapaṭalaḥ nāma suprasāritakaiḥ tathā

original: muhurmuhuḥ kāmayed vajrī adha ūrdhvaṃ nirīkṣayet‍ |
analyzed: muhur muhur kāmayet vajrī adhas ūrdhvam nirīkṣayet
prāpnoti vipulām siddhim sarva buddha samaḥ bhavet
ca eva viśeṣataḥ

original: karpūraṃ pīyate tatra madanaṃ caiva balasya bhakṣaṇaṃ tatra kuryāt karpūrahetunā || 15 ||
analyzed: karpūram pīyate tatra madanam ca eva balasya bhakṣaṇam tatra kuryāt karpūra hetunā

original: madanaṃ mahāsukhodbhavam, aṅga iti tadarthaṃ nakhakṣatāḥ karaiḥ , karmeti dvayaṅgulicālanādi, bolavān iti stabdhabola : |
analyzed: madanam mahā sukha udbhavam aṅge iti tad artham nakha kṣatāḥ karaiḥ karma iti dvayaṅguli cālana ādi bolavān iti stabdha bola

original: dolāye 'tyādineti caturṇāṃ sekānāṃ' svabhāvalakṣaṇopadeśakaraṇānyāha - doleva daulā, aupariṣṭakam |
analyzed: tyādinā iti caturṇām sekānām svabhāva lakṣaṇa upadeśa karaṇāni āha dolā iva daulā aupariṣṭakam

original: atra strī kartrī- agrataḥ pṛṣṭhato nārī kramaśo dolayet kaṭim |

original: atra puruṣa : karttā - nāryājānusamaṃ sthāpya dakṣiṇaṃ vāmabāhunā yojayedūrdhvakaraṇaṃ sthitāvabhimukhāvubhau || suprasāritetyādi haṃsapakṣasamākāram uttāraṇāyā ( : ) prakīrtitāḥ |
analyzed: atra puruṣa karttā nāryā jānu samam sthāpya dakṣiṇam vāma bāhunā yojayet ūrdhvakaraṇam sthitau abhimukhau ubhau su prasārita ityādi haṃsa pakṣa sama ākāram uttāraṇāyā prakīrtitāḥ

original: dvābhyāṃ prasaritābhyāṃ pādābhyāṃ suprasāritam || tathetyanena sūcīmāha - uttānordhvamadhaḥ pādau daṇḍavad yatra saṃsthitaḥ |
analyzed: dvābhyām prasaritābhyām pādābhyām su prasāritam tathā iti anena sūcīm āha uttāna ūrdhvam adhas pādau daṇḍa vat yatra saṃsthitaḥ

original: pārśvaṃ nataṃ trikaṃ kiñcit sūcīkaraṇaṃ smṛtam ||11-13||
analyzed: pārśvam natam trikam kiñcid sūcīkaraṇam smṛtam
